item.title: About
item.description: Presentation Hi there! I am a biophysicist and entrepreneur based in Paris. I hope to share some more news about my project soon. Until recently, I used to work in the Physical Microfluidics and Bioengineering lab at the Pasteur Institute. The PμB develops new microfluidic setups and quantitative tools to study complex biological phenomena, such as yeast DNA repair mechanisms or the bacterial SOS response. I have recently completed my PhD between the Pasteur Institute and the École polytechnique.
